00009 #include "TTDCBlock.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 TTDCBlock::TTDCBlock(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels),
00014         lastInput(NULL),
00015         lastOutput(NULL)
00016 {
00017         // make the clear method available to be called:
00018         registerMessage(TT("clear"), (TTMethod)&TTDCBlock::clear);
00019         
00020         // this next one is called by the parent class so we can allocate memory as required
00021         registerMessage(TT("updateMaxNumChannels"), (TTMethod)&TTDCBlock::updateMaxNumChannels);
00022 
00023         // Set Defaults...
00024         setParameterValue(TT("maxNumChannels"), newMaxNumChannels);
00025         setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTDCBlock::processAudio);
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 TTDCBlock::~TTDCBlock()
00030 {
00031         free(lastInput);
00032         free(lastOutput);
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 TTErr TTDCBlock::updateMaxNumChannels()
00037 {
00038         if(lastInput)
00039                 free(lastInput);
00040         if(lastOutput)
00041                 free(lastOutput);
00042         lastInput = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00043         lastOutput = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00044         clear();
00045         return kTTErrNone;
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 TTErr TTDCBlock::clear()
00050 {
00051         short i;
00052 
00053         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++){
00054                 lastInput[i] = 0;
00055                 lastOutput[i] = 0;
00056         }
00057         return kTTErrNone;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 // DSP LOOP
00062 TTErr TTDCBlock::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00063 {
00064         short                   vs;
00065         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00066                                         *outSample;
00067         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00068         short                   channel;
00069         TTSampleValue   temp;
00070 
00071         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00072                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00073                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00074                 vs = in.vs;
00075                 
00076                 while(vs--){
00077                         temp = *inSample++;
00078                         *outSample++ = lastOutput[channel] = antiDenormal(temp - lastInput[channel] + (lastOutput[channel] * 0.9997));
00079                         lastInput[channel] = temp;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         return kTTErrNone;
00083 }
